body.name: Phone Tripod, 63-inch Selfie Stick Tripod Compatible with iPhone/Camera/GoPro/Webcam, Lightweight Travel Phone Tripod with Phone Holder Mount/Wireless Remote for Vlogging/Video Recording/Photography
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 9 hrs 23 mins
features: 1.【2-In-1 Selfie Stick Tripod 】 This Lusweimi versatile phone tripod offers the flexibility of functioning as both a tripod stand and a selfie stick, allowing you to choose the mode that suits your needs best. Crafted with upgraded aluminum alloy and rare mental material, it remains incredibly lightweight at just 0.67 pounds, ensuring effortless portability. Its compact design suits various occasions like travel, parties, hiking, and indoor/outdoor activities.

2.【 Free Rotation & Extendable 】 This travel tripod features 180° head rotation and adjustable height by stretching. Stability is ensured by rubber anti-skid pads at the base. You can easily fix leg angles using the rotating part. Additionally, by rotating the screw at the bottom, you can extend the axis and convert the tripod into a selfie stick. Weighing just 0.67 pounds, this tripod is lightweight and can be conveniently folded for storage.

3.【 Stability and Non-slip 】 The Lusweimi phone tripod stand features a professional double-layer tripod design and non-slip silicone pads, delivering exceptional stability and sturdiness. Its universal 1/4" Screw Mount allows for seamless compatibility with mirrorless camera, action cameras, webcams, and more, making it an ideal choice for photography, live-streaming, video recording, vlogging, FaceTime, and various other activities.

4.【 Wide Compatibility 】 The phone holder offers a wide range of adjustability, accommodating smartphones with screen sizes ranging from 2.5 to 4.1 inches. It is designed to be compatible with a broad selection of smartphones available in the market, including popular models such as iPhone 14, 14 Pro, 14 Pro Max, iPhone 13, 13 Pro, 13 Pro Max, iPhone 12, 12 Pro Max, iPhone X, XS, as well as various Huawei and Samsung Galaxy devices like S21, S20, and S10, among others.

5.【 Package List & Excellent Service 】 The cell phone tripod is equipped with a wireless Remote Shutter, you can conveniently take photos from a distance of up to 33 feet/10 m, allowing you to achieve the perfect shot without the need to hold the phone in your hand. Included in the package are three essential items: a 63-inch selfie tripod, a wireless remote, and a phone holder. Contact us for inquiries or concerns. We provide 24-month after-sales support for a smooth shopping experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stretchable Central Axis Stretch the tripod for height adjustment, and extend the central axis separately to create an adjustable selfie stick, ranging from 7.1" to 60.5". Rotatable Ball Head The top part of this tripod is capable of a 180° rotation, enabling you to fine-tune the device's angle within a specific range. Fixed Knob The knob at the bottom of the bracket is designed to secure the leg angle. Twist it to adjust and fix the height as needed. Non-slip Feet Reliable anti-slip foot pads ensure stability on any surface, providing dependable support and balance for your photography needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid for photo
reviews.reviewText: The 63-inch Selfie Stick Tripod offers the flexibility and reliability needed for various scenarios. It is durable & user-friendly. features make it a valuable addition to any content creator. I recommend this tripod for anyone seeking a solution for their photography and videography endeavors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most Versatile Tripod for a Steal?
reviews.reviewText: So I've got to be completely honesty. At first I was skeptical to order since the price for a multipurpose tripod was too good to be true but boy was I wrong! The quality on this tripod is actually way better than what I expected and comes in handy when i most need it! The stand at max height isn't all wobbly like other tripods and the selfie stick itself isn't wonky when at max length either. I've had other tripods as I like to film content and this tripod by far has proven itself at the price point. If you're skeptical about trying this tripod out then don't be. Take it from someone who's gone through like five other tripods I've gotten from Amazon. I'd rate this at maybe a solid 9.5/10. Only reason it isn't a 10/10 is because I didn't find this tripod any sooner lol!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. So far I'm pretty happy with the seller .I had an issue with the first one and within the next day they were able to ship me one out. And this is the video that I just recorded using the tripod which was pretty easy to use and not too cumbersome. I wish the leg was not as wide and it was smaller. I would like it to be and I was wishing that it's the leg was not that's wide because I'd like to travel with it and I don't want it to be too cumbersome. But overall experience with the product great so far I'm enjoying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and Sturdy Phone Tripod for Ultimate Flexibility
reviews.reviewText: Whether you're a vlogger, photographer, or simply someone who enjoys capturing moments on the fly, the 63-inch Selfie Stick Tripod offers the flexibility and reliability needed for various scenarios. Its durability, compatibility, and user-friendly features make it a valuable addition to any content creator's toolkit. I highly recommend this tripod for anyone seeking a versatile and dependable solution for their photography and videography endeavors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The phone tripod is a great addition to any photographer or videographer's toolkit. It provides sturdy support for your phone while capturing images or video and it's easy to use. The adjustable legs provide stability on any surface and the phone holder grip is secure without damaging your phone. The tripod is also lightweight and compact, making it easy to carry in your bag while travelling. Overall, I'm very impressed with this phone tripod and would highly recommend it for any mobile content creator.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for outdoor photography
reviews.reviewText: I am a social media influencer and I usually take my own pictures. This is a very handy tripod and very sturdy. Perfect for my outdoor shoots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son used it 2 times and the legs broke. The pins came out and were lost....not a very sturdy product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great compact tripod
reviews.reviewText: This is a great tripod. I like how compact it gets when you fold it up. It’s so light weight, I don’t have any issues taking it with me wherever I need to go. Overall performance is great and I definitely recommend it.
